sense.def: ① Alternative Names bu neng yan 不能言 ; bu neng yu 不能語 ; yu yan nan chu 語言難出 , impeded speech. Pathological Condition of an inability to speak brought forth by either mental blockage, diseases affecting the throat, or any other cause. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 8: 卒半身不遂，手 足拘急不得屈伸，身體冷，或智或痴，或身強直不語 , “Suddenly one half of the body no longer follows [one’s will]. Hands and feet cramp and are tense, and cannot be stretched or bent. In some cases [patients] are conscious, in others not. Sometimes the body is stiff and straight and [patients] do not speak ”.

② Pathological Condition of children who after completing their third year are still unable to open their mouth and learn how to speak. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 治小兒四五歲不語方 , “Recipe to cure children who at the age of four, five years do not speak ”.
